post_title: FS - T206 HOF George Davis PSA 6 ***SOLD***
post_content:
Hi all, 

I have a PSA 6 George Davis P150 for sale.  Centering is great and extremely bold colors on both sides - one of the boldest backs in my collection.  I’m looking for $OLD shipped but am open to offers.  REA sale price from august was $2200.

 Feel free to email me at [url]Paul.curlee1@gmail.com[/url] or text at 915-449-7623.

Paul Curlee
